name: Schools and Educational Services: not elsewhere classified
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that offer educational courses and services that are not
described by another more specific MCC. Such merchants include
schools that teach music, drama, art, cooking, modeling, karate
schools, automobile driving instruction, traffic safety, flying
instruction, and sewing or knitting instruction.
For dance schools, use MCC 7911.
For schools that grant academic degrees for courses of study in
music, drama, and art, uses MCC 8220.
